com.bluegosling.reflect

Interface TypeAnnotationHierarchy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TypeAnnotationChecker

    public interface TypeAnnotationHierarchy
extends TypeAnnotationChecker
    Models a type hierarchy for type annotations. The same basic assignability concepts apply as for a TypeAnnotationChecker except that a hierarchy can be queried for all super-types of a given type.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description

      A builder for creating instances of TypeAnnotationHierarchy.

    • Method Detail

      • getDirectSupertypeAnnotations

        Set<Annotation> getDirectSupertypeAnnotations(Annotation annotation)
        Returns the set of type annotations that qualify supertypes of types with the given annotation. If an annotation A1 is a supertype annotation of an annotation A2, then for any type T, A1 T is a supertype of A2 T.

        If two annotations are equivalent, they are each supertypes of the other (and thus also subtypes of the other).

        If this hierarchy does not have knowledge of the given annotation, it should return an empty set. If an unqualified type (e.g. without annotations) is a direct supertype of one with the given annotation, the returned set should include a null. Similarly, if the provided annotation is null, the returned set should be annotations for the direct supertypes of an unqualified type.

        Parameters:
        annotation - a type annotation
        Returns:
        the supertype annotations of the given annotation

      • getDirectSupertypes

        default Set<AnnotatedType> getDirectSupertypes(AnnotatedType type)
        Returns the set of supertypes of the given annotated type. This includes all supertypes with the same annotations as given. It also includes formulations of the same type, but with supertype annotations.

        The default implementation uses getDirectSupertypeAnnotations(Annotation) and AnnotatedTypes.getAnnotatedDirectSupertypes(AnnotatedType) to compute the full set of supertypes.

        Parameters:
        type - an annotated type
        Returns:
        the annotated supertypes of the given type
